description:
Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unnecessary subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Watch The Rings of Power on Prime Video and download the Amazon Music app to listen to all eight episodes of The Official The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Podcast for free on Amazon Music.

PlayStation VR 2 officially gets a price and release date, Embracer shuts down Square Enix Montreal, and more on this jam packed episode with Blessing and Greg.

If you missed it, Greg revealed the first details about Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord and Mike carved pumpkins on Monday’s Kinda Funny Halloween stream. It was like a Halloween party that was partially sponsored by Ghostbusters VR and partially sponsored by embarrassing stories from Kevin's Halloween party. Check it out on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!
